data.title: Le Discours Du Premier Ministre, Sir Anerood Jugnauth, Lors Du Passing Out Parade
data.meta_description:
Le discours du Premier ministre, sir Anerood Jugnauth, lors du Passing Out Parade - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is the transcript of a speech given by Prime Minister Anerood Jugnauth at the passing out parade of 546 new police constables in Mauritius. The key points are:

1) PM Jugnauth congratulates the 546 new police constables for completing their 22-week training program and being ready to serve Mauritius. 

2) He emphasizes the importance of ensuring safety and security in Mauritius given emerging threats, and outlines investments made to modernize and equip the police force.

3) PM Jugnauth urges the new police constables to uphold their oath and serve the people of Mauritius with integrity and commitment.
